content: this legal text is about a specific case referred to as case n° 13002023 the court has made a final decision regarding the division of assets in the case the property located in sassuolo will be divided with 13 going to the plaintiff and 23 going to the defendant the court has also ordered one party to pay the other a sum of €530321 along with additional compensation the payment is to be made by july 2023 upon the release of the property the court has dissolved the joint ownership and ordered the sale of the property the case proceedings will be closed as per a separate order

metadata.cost: To be established in the final decision.
